      Methods in bgu.spl.mics with parameters of type Broadcast 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void MicroService.sendBroadcast(Broadcast b)
      send the broadcast message b using the message-bus.
      void MessageBus.sendBroadcast(Broadcast b)
      add the Broadcast b to the message queues of all the micro-services subscribed to b.getClass().
      Method parameters in bgu.spl.mics with type arguments of type Broadcast 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MessageBus.subscribeBroadcast(java.lang.Class<? extends Broadcast> type, MicroService m)
      subscribes m to receive Broadcasts of type type.
